title: Bug 6410 - File appears dirtied but not changed by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. However, the code assist feature does not appear.
OB: The file is marked as dirtied, but no changes have been made. Code assist does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied when no changes have been made. Code assist should appear when triggered.
SR: To resolve this issue, the file should not be marked as dirty when code assist is triggered without making any changes. Additionally, the code assist feature should be displayed as expected.
